# nb-toast



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description       | Type       | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------- | ---------- | ----------- |
| `duration`  | `duration`   | 消失延时时间 0 -> 不自动消失 | `number`   | `2000`      |
| `maxLength` | `max-length` | 最大显示宽度            | `number`   | `480`       |
| `position`  | `position`   | 显示位置              | `"center"` | `'center'`  |
| `theme`     | `theme`      | 样式定义              | `string`   | `'default'` |
| `visible`   | `visible`    | 可见开关              | `boolean`  | `false`     |


## Methods

### `show(message?: string) => Promise<any>`

显示

#### Parameters

| Name      | Type     | Description   |
| --------- | -------- | ------------- |
| `message` | `string` | 如果需要覆盖原有信息则填写 |

Type: `Promise<any>`
